title: Modern Residential Villa
description: Contemporary family home with sustainable features
fullDescription: A modern family villa designed with sustainability in mind. Features include solar panels, geothermal heating, and natural ventilation systems.

title: Commercial Office Space
description: Open concept office with flexible workspaces
fullDescription: A flexible office space designed for the modern workforce. The open concept design promotes collaboration while providing private areas for focused work.

title: Minimalist Apartment Renovation
fullDescription: This renovation project transformed a dated 1970s apartment into a modern, minimalist living space with improved functionality and natural light.

title: Conceptual Urban Housing
fullDescription: A personal research project exploring solutions for increasing urban density while maintaining quality of life and green spaces.
